string.text:
Special 12 gauge shell filled with 8 mm shot.
 
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Highest pierced armour class: %c[ui_gray_1]none
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Tissue damage rating: %c[ui_gray_1]medium - high
 
%c[ui_gray_1]SPECIAL:
 
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] expanding cloud of pellets, short eff. range
